title: Ophthalmology (Eye Care) in India
intro: Advanced vision correction and eye surgery in India with expert ophthalmologists, cutting-edge technology, and comprehensive eye care services. Panacea Medcare connects patients to leading eye care centers for all ophthalmic needs.

cataract.title: Cataract Surgery (Premium IOLs)
cataract.description: Advanced cataract surgery in India with premium intraocular lenses for vision correction, including multifocal and toric IOLs with excellent visual outcomes.

lasik.title: LASIK & Refractive Surgery
lasik.description: LASIK and refractive surgery in India for vision correction including PRK, SMILE, and other advanced techniques with high precision and success rates.

cornea.title: Cornea Transplant
cornea.description: Cornea transplantation in India including full-thickness and partial-thickness grafts with advanced techniques and excellent graft survival rates.

retina.title: Retina & Vitreous Surgery
retina.description: Expert retinal surgery in India for conditions like retinal detachment, macular degeneration, diabetic retinopathy, and vitreous disorders.

glaucoma.title: Glaucoma Treatment
glaucoma.description: Comprehensive glaucoma management in India including medical treatment, laser procedures, and surgical options to preserve vision and prevent progression.

pediatric.title: Paediatric Ophthalmology
pediatric.description: Specialized pediatric eye care in India for children with strabismus, amblyopia, congenital cataracts, and other pediatric eye conditions.
